医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
碱基编辑有望治疗镰状细胞病和β地中海贫血改变血红蛋白基因的基因疗法可能是治疗镰状细胞病（SCD）和β地中海贫血的答案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Base-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-sickle-cell-disease-and-beta-thalassemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Base-editing-shows-promise-for-treating-sickle-cell-disease-and-beta-thalassemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc33868b-c083-4928-8721-2531cb049f7b Mon, 03 Jul 2023 12:12:45 -0400 Base editing shows promise for treating sickle cell disease and beta thalassemia
内分泌学会的《内分泌学会杂志》首次获得影响因子评分内分泌学会的《内分泌学会期刊》(JES) 于 2022 年首次获得影响因子评分，而该学会的其他期刊在这一著名的学术出版衡量标准中保持着较高的排名。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Endocrine-Societys-Journal-of-the-Endocrine-Society-receives-first-Impact-Factor-score.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Endocrine-Societys-Journal-of-the-Endocrine-Society-receives-first-Impact-Factor-score.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a83a2555-1d7e-4acd-bf05-3db0f0852399 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 11:56:53 -0400 Endocrine Society's Journal of the Endocrine Society receives first Impact Factor score
SPG-15：一位母亲为基因疗法而奋斗，麦迪的故事News Medical 采访了 Maddi 基金会的首席执行官兼创始人，以了解患者对基因治疗研究的重要性的看法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/SPG-15-A-Mothers-Fight-for-a-Gene-Therapy-Cure-Maddis-Story.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/SPG-15-A-Mothers-Fight-for-a-Gene-Therapy-Cure-Maddis-Story.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=429f583e-b770-4364-8caf-ff11cefbfc1a Mon, 03 Jul 2023 11:28:00 -0400 SPG-15: A Mother's Fight for a Gene Therapy Cure, Maddi's Story
研究发现蓝舌病毒携带者在冬季活跃蓝舌病病毒是一种无法治愈的导致牛羊死亡的疾病，由曾经被认为会在冬季消失的微小苍蝇传播。新的研究表明，尽管在寒冷时很难找到它们，但它们仍然很活跃。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Bluetongue-virus-carriers-active-in-winter-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Bluetongue-virus-carriers-active-in-winter-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=795b6e47-84a4-4bd6-a1a8-06cbba4b93c2 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 11:11:45 -0400 Bluetongue virus carriers active in winter, study finds
打破神话：研究发现阿片类药物对急性背痛没有任何好处第一个阿片类药物治疗急性腰背和颈部疼痛的安慰剂对照试验。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Breaking-the-myth-opioids-provide-no-advantage-for-acute-back-pain-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Breaking-the-myth-opioids-provide-no-advantage-for-acute-back-pain-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f85d0885-a7e0-4dbb-8ced-8f99bc0ae850 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 11:10:00 -0400 Breaking the myth: opioids provide no advantage for acute back pain, study finds
加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的团队获得 CDC 拨款 925,000 美元，用于跟踪 MPOX 爆发的四个监测项目加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的团队获得了美国疾病控制与预防中心 (CDC) 新拨款的 925,000 美元，用于开展四个监测项目，追踪全美范围内的mpox（以前称为猴痘）的爆发https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/UCLA-led-team-receives-24925000-CDC-grant-for-four-surveillance-projects-tracking-mpox-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/UCLA-led-team-receives-24925000-CDC-grant-for-four-surveillance-projects-tracking-mpox-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f15ee4a-3060-4b45-88d5-bbd0e81c1dae Mon, 03 Jul 2023 11:05:22 -0400 UCLA-led team receives $925,000 CDC grant for four surveillance projects tracking mpox outbreaks
精准保护：抗体检测为预测免疫功能低下患者的 SARS-CoV-2 感染风险提供了见解研究人员使用抗体检测来预测严重急性呼吸综合征冠状病毒 2 (SARS-CoV-2) 感染的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Precision-protection-antibody-testing-offers-insights-into-predicting-SARS-CoV-2-infection-risk-in-immunocompromished-患者.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Precision-protection-antibody-testing-offers-insights-into-predicting-SARS-CoV-2-infection-risk-in-immunocompromished-患者.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=30a2985c-1091-476c-bbfa-adf3a5295afb Mon, 03 Jul 2023 10:39:00 -0400 Precision protection: antibody testing offers insights into predicting SARS-CoV-2 infection risk in immunocompromised patients
通过自我转介短暂入院可减少严重自残青少年对紧急护理的需求通过自我转介获得短期入院减少了严重自残青少年对紧急护理的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Brief-admission-by-self-referral-reduces-need-for-emergency-care-in-adolescents-with-severe-self-harm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Brief-admission-by-self-referral-reduces-need-for-emergency-care-in-adolescents-with-severe-self-harm.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c04f4466-544b-493c-895d-830560199164 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 10:33:58 -0400 Brief admission by self-referral reduces need for emergency care in adolescents with severe self-harm
维生素 D 补充剂可降低 60 岁以上人群心脏病发作的风险《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项临床试验发现，维生素 D 补充剂可以降低 60 岁以上人群发生心脏病等重大心血管事件的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-people-over-60.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Vitamin-D-supplements-may-reduce-risk-of-heart-attacks-in-people-over-60.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01948f4a-7681-47d6-b1b6-ca2cb19a7611 Mon, 03 Jul 2023 10:02:00 -0400 Vitamin D supplements may reduce risk of heart attacks in people over 60
咖啡因被发现对治疗出生窒息最有效出生时缺氧引起的脑损伤是全世界新生儿死亡的主要原因之一。波恩大学医院 (UKB) 和 DZNE 的研究人员使用小动物模型测试了 25 种不同活性药物的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Caffeine-found-to-be-most- effective-for-treating-birth-asphyxia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230703/Caffeine-found-to-be-most- effective-for-treating-birth-asphyxia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=780c25b0-805f-4f91-a257-38efbbe8164a Mon, 03 Jul 2023 09:52:02 -0400 Caffeine found to be most effective for treating birth asphyxia
